Posts.Content: You can have the occassional pity party, but that is no fun.  I have GBM, so I get up in the morning and do everything I can to lead a normal life.  I know GBM will end me, but why dwell on it.  That will just make me depressed and that is no fun.  try to do as much as possible before you were dx.  You got a 2nd chance to do everything you wanted too.  Live it up josh
Posts.Title: Life after cancer
